title: SCTIMST Recruitment 2026 - Walk-in-Interview for Senior Project Engineer Posts
description: Sree Chitra Tirunal Institute for Medical Sciences and Technology (SCTIMST) has declared the official notification for 2026. To fill up the vacancies for  Senior Project Engineer Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech, M.E/ M.Tech in Mechanical Engineeringcan use this chance and apply for the SCTIMST Recruitment 2026 . Here, we included the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested can...
